working-hours-body: Monday - Closed Tuesday - Closed Wednesday - 10:00 - 18:00 Thursday 10:00 - 22:00 Friday - 10:00 - 22:00 Saturday - 10:00 - 18:00 Sunday - Closed
header-title: Unleashing the Artistry of Coffee and Wine!
home-subtitle: Your local Café & Vinothek in the heart of Munich
home-body: Our cozy café blends specialty coffee, fresh baked goods, savory main courses, and a selection of wine and spirits. From the first sip to the last bite, experience flavors that awaken your taste buds. Discover the power of culinary harmony as coffee, baking, and savory dishes converge for an unforgettable dining experience. Indulge at Cafino, where every moment is a symphony of tastes and aromas.
food-slider-title: Kaffee, Gebäck oder Wein... Wonach auch immer Sie suchen!
contact-body: We warmly invite you to reach out to us for any inquiries or to make a reservation. Our team is dedicated to ensuring your experience with us is exceptional. To secure your spot, please feel free to give us a call. We greatly appreciate your interest and look forward to serving you soon.
